title: Leaver buster
body: Computer crashes, internet dcs, and I get five 20 minute queue timers. I never afk, this is so bullshit. Ive wasted hours for something  out of my control. Riot, your game crashes my pc, then you punish me for it. Wtf.

replies.body: TBH i signed in to say i love your name, but yeah they are really stupid when it comes to that kind of thing, but its here because players wanted some kind of punishement for afks(even if you didnt afk) definately needs improvement, some kind of human monitering, very silly
this is LOL in a nutshell get use to it

The leavebuster system never give players a 20 minute LPQ as a first punishment (except, perhaps, in extreme cases). If you believe you've been falsely punished, you need to submit a ticket to support (link: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) as posting here will not help your situation. Be aware, though, that I've never heard of a case where a player got a LPQ punishment reverted, even in the rare situations where the player was falsely punished.

First time leavers can be punished if the game were ranked, as they want to protect the competitive environment (just like losing LP if you were the cause of remake). Punishments also seem to be handed out quicker if players have a high leave ratio compared to the number of games they have played. 

No use sending in a support ticket, Riot will not reverse leaverbuster queue under ANY circumstances.

> *No use sending in a support ticket*, Riot will not reverse leaverbuster queue under ANY circumstances.

I disagree. Even if Riot wont revert the punishment, it can be helpful in identifying flaws in the system. Any relevant information can give them a place to start from to identify why the false positive occurred and help prevent them in the future.

A valid point, if something had gone wrong then definitely, even if they can't/won't change anything it's worth them knowing. I believe Yaia was simply referring to this particular case where it seems more than likely it was a true positive.

That said, we don't have all the info here to confirm it as a false positive or otherwise, as we know all too well just cause he says he's never afked doesn't make it so :)

Sure it sucks getting a leaverbuster for having dodgy net or cause you've got your shit together/stopped afking but then your pc crashes that one time but in the end, it comes down to protecting 1 person or 9.
Oh, Riot doesn't care about helping individual players in their experience. Im just posting to raise awareness of this completely trash system.
Not much you can do about it. I got a 20 min queue because of bug splat and I sent in a support ticket. The response was that they can't fix it, unfortunately it is what it is
Yep, not much you can do. Everyone has gotten it :P. They can't really remove your queue time it because that would allow players to exploits it
